meanings.definition: Paid for after use or receipt of goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The postpaid plan allowed me to pay for my phone bill at the end of the month.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the postpaid option because she could pay for her purchases later.
meanings.sent3: I found it funny that I could be postpaid for my meal at the restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The idea of being postpaid for my work felt like a weight off my shoulders.
meanings.sent5: Being postpaid for my chores made me feel like a responsible adult.

meanings.definition: A service where payment is made after use.
meanings.sent1: The postpaid service allowed customers to pay for their usage at the end of the month.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer postpaid plans for their convenience in paying bills later.
meanings.sent3: I chuckled at the thought of being postpaid for my internet usage.
meanings.sent4: The postpaid system felt like a safety net for those who needed flexibility in payments.
meanings.sent5: The concept of postpaid services made budgeting easier for many customers.
